remarks:
Version of ~ 19.9 with a dv condition, requiring fewer axioms.  Any formula can be existentially quantified using a variable which it does not contain.  See also ~ 19.3v .  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-7 .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2017.) 

---

 Special case of Theorem 19.9 of [Margaris] p. 89.  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.)  (Revised by NM, 21-May-2007.)
statement:
19.9v $p |- ( E. x ph <-> ph ) $.
$d ph x $.
